name: Double Shock
description: You discharge all the electricity from your body to perform a high damage attack. Make a melee attack against a target, doing 2d10 + MOVE electric damage on a hit. You lose your electric typing unless terastallized; if mono-electric, your type becomes typeless.
This move may only be used if you have electric typing. You regain electric typing after a short rest.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
